## ProtectableMap.set() method

Sets a value for the specified key. This operation does NOT invoke the ProtectableMap onSet() hook.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
set(key: K, value: V): this;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  key | K |  |
|  value | V |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

this
